property.name: httpfs.http.port
property.description: The HTTP port for HttpFS REST API.

property.name: httpfs.http.hostname
property.description: The bind host for HttpFS REST API.

property.name: httpfs.http.administrators
property.description: ACL for the admins, this configuration is used to control who can access the default servlets for HttpFS server. The value should be a comma separated list of users and groups. The user list comes first and is separated by a space followed by the group list, e.g. "user1,user2 group1,group2". Both users and groups are optional, so "user1", " group1", "", "user1 group1", "user1,user2 group1,group2" are all valid (note the leading space in " group1"). '*' grants access to all users and groups, e.g. '*', '* ' and ' *' are all valid.

property.name: httpfs.ssl.enabled
property.description: Whether SSL is enabled. Default is false, i.e. disabled.

property.name: hadoop.http.idle_timeout.ms
property.description: Httpfs Server connection timeout in milliseconds.

property.name: hadoop.http.max.threads
property.description: The maxmimum number of threads.

property.name: hadoop.http.max.request.header.size
property.description: The maxmimum HTTP request header size.

property.name: hadoop.http.max.response.header.size
property.description: The maxmimum HTTP response header size.

property.name: hadoop.http.temp.dir
property.description: HttpFS temp directory.

property.name: httpfs.buffer.size
property.description: The buffer size used by a read/write request when streaming data from/to HDFS.

property.name: httpfs.services
property.description: Services used by the httpfs server.

property.name: kerberos.realm
property.description:
Kerberos realm, used only if Kerberos authentication is used between the clients and httpfs or between HttpFS and HDFS.
This property is only used to resolve other properties within this configuration file.

property.name: httpfs.hostname
property.description:
Property used to synthetize the HTTP Kerberos principal used by httpfs.
This property is only used to resolve other properties within this configuration file.

property.name: hadoop.http.authentication.signature.secret.file
property.description:
File containing the secret to sign HttpFS hadoop-auth cookies.
This file should be readable only by the system user running HttpFS service.
If multiple HttpFS servers are used in a load-balancer/round-robin fashion, they should share the secret file.
If the secret file specified here does not exist, random secret is generated at startup time.
httpfs.authentication.signature.secret.file is deprecated. Instead use hadoop.http.authentication.signature.secret.file.

property.name: hadoop.http.authentication.type
property.description:
Defines the authentication mechanism used by httpfs for its HTTP clients.
Valid values are 'simple' or 'kerberos'.
If using 'simple' HTTP clients must specify the username with the 'user.name' query string parameter.
If using 'kerberos' HTTP clients must use HTTP SPNEGO or delegation tokens.
httpfs.authentication.type is deprecated. Instead use hadoop.http.authentication.type.

property.name: hadoop.http.authentication.kerberos.principal
property.description:
The HTTP Kerberos principal used by HttpFS in the HTTP endpoint.
The HTTP Kerberos principal MUST start with 'HTTP/' per Kerberos HTTP SPNEGO specification.
httpfs.authentication.kerberos.principal is deprecated. Instead use hadoop.http.authentication.kerberos.principal.

property.name: hadoop.http.authentication.kerberos.keytab
property.description:
The Kerberos keytab file with the credentials for the HTTP Kerberos principal used by httpfs in the HTTP endpoint.
httpfs.authentication.kerberos.keytab is deprecated. Instead use hadoop.http.authentication.kerberos.keytab.

property.name: httpfs.delegation.token.manager.update.interval
property.description: HttpFS delegation token update interval, default 1 day, in seconds.

property.name: httpfs.delegation.token.manager.max.lifetime
property.description: HttpFS delegation token maximum lifetime, default 7 days, in seconds

property.name: httpfs.delegation.token.manager.renewal.interval
property.description: HttpFS delegation token update interval, default 1 day, in seconds.

property.name: httpfs.hadoop.authentication.type
property.description:
Defines the authentication mechanism used by httpfs to connect to the HDFS Namenode.
Valid values are 'simple' and 'kerberos'.

property.name: httpfs.hadoop.authentication.kerberos.keytab
property.description: The Kerberos keytab file with the credentials for the Kerberos principal used by httpfs to connect to the HDFS Namenode.

property.name: httpfs.hadoop.authentication.kerberos.principal
property.description: The Kerberos principal used by httpfs to connect to the HDFS Namenode.

property.name: httpfs.hadoop.filesystem.cache.purge.frequency
property.description: Frequency, in seconds, for the idle filesystem purging daemon runs.

property.name: httpfs.hadoop.filesystem.cache.purge.timeout
property.description: Timeout, in seconds, for an idle filesystem to be purged.

property.name: httpfs.access.mode
property.description: Sets the access mode for HTTPFS. If access is not allowed the FORBIDDED (403) is returned. Valid access modes are: read-write Full Access allowed write-only PUT POST and DELETE full Access. GET only allows GETFILESTATUS and LISTSTATUS read-only GET Full Access PUT POST and DELETE are FORBIDDEN
